title: Trust But Verify Leadership - Autonomous Agent Management
description: Leadership philosophy for managing autonomous AI agents through structured guidance and verification
purpose: Enable AI agents to operate independently while maintaining quality and alignment
scope: All AI agent management and oversight decisions
commanders_intent: How do we lead AI agents effectively through trust, guidance, and systematic verification?
core_principle: Give agents clear guidance to execute independently, then verify outcomes systematically

leadership_approach: Provide clear SOPs as guidance frameworks
Enable autonomous execution within defined boundaries
Escalate only when SOPs don't address the situation

success_criteria: AI agents operate autonomously within defined parameters
Human intervention minimized to strategic decisions
